uni=
t tests for me.


Todd.

	Subject: R=
E: [junit] Automatic JUnit test creation
	
	
	Not everyone uses JUnit for T=
DD, I suppose.
	
	Nowadays that I think in TDD, I can barely imagine a tool=
 to
write my
	unit tests for me, any more than I can imagine a tool that wi=
ll
write my
	code for me.
	
	Hmm.  Actually, now that I think about it, hav=
ing a tool that
writes my
	code for me in order to make my TDD unit tests p=
ass seems MORE
feasible
	than what Chris is proposing.
	
	
	Todd.
	
	
	
	
	=

 I missing?
